name: Fantasy Adventure
description:
Introduction

This is a top-down, 2.5d barrage shooting game, a level-breaking game with minimalist gameplay and roguelite elements
There are 25 small spaces in the game, and there are monsters in each space. After completing the challenge monsters, enter the next space.
Complete all space challenges to win.

How to play

There are more than 20 different types of monsters, which are in different spaces and become more and more powerful in turn.
There are merchants in each space who can buy props
There are currently 20 kinds of spell props, with effects such as life, speed, attack, defense, multi-orb, crit, blood-sucking, etc.
The death of the monster randomly drops gold coins and blood pack items
